metrics.name: go.memory.used - other
metrics.label: Memory used by the Go runtime - Other
metrics.description: Memory used by the Go runtime - Other

metrics.name: metrics.sums.go.opentelemetry.io/contrib/instrumentation/runtime/go.memory.used{go.memory.type="stack"}
metrics.label: Memory used by the Go runtime - Stack
metrics.description: Memory used by the Go runtime - Stack

metrics.name: metrics.sums.go.opentelemetry.io/contrib/instrumentation/runtime/go.memory.limit{}
metrics.label: Go runtime memory limit configured by the user, if a limit exists
metrics.description: Go runtime memory limit configured by the user, if a limit exists

metrics.name: metrics.sums.go.opentelemetry.io/contrib/instrumentation/runtime/go.memory.allocated{}
metrics.label: Memory allocated to the heap by the application
metrics.description: Memory allocated to the heap by the application

metrics.name: metrics.sums.go.opentelemetry.io/contrib/instrumentation/runtime/go.memory.allocations{}
metrics.label: Count of allocations to the heap by the application
metrics.description: Count of allocations to the heap by the application

metrics.name: metrics.sums.go.opentelemetry.io/contrib/instrumentation/runtime/go.memory.gc.goal{}
metrics.label: Heap size target for the end of the GC cycle
metrics.description: Heap size target for the end of the GC cycle

metrics.name: metrics.sums.go.opentelemetry.io/contrib/instrumentation/runtime/go.processor.limit{}
metrics.label: The number of OS threads that can execute user-level Go code simultaneously.
metrics.description: The number of OS threads that can execute user-level Go code simultaneously.

metrics.name: metrics.sums.go.opentelemetry.io/contrib/instrumentation/runtime/go.config.gogc{}
metrics.label: Heap size target percentage configured by the user, otherwise 100
metrics.description: Heap size target percentage configured by the user, otherwise 100
